name: Kids Car Racing - Baby driver
description:
A best 3D racing game “Kids Car Racing” with cartoon style race tracks and HD graphics environments that lets your kids to play racing game with more attention and full of driving control to learn race and run successfully.
Do you virtue of go to nitro mood? As this is not a Moto bike racer, all you need is to boost your kids playing and racing skills. You can enjoy this racing game by dodging the other cars, buses and Lories, make more coins and score by increasing travel distance.
Enjoy with this car trip as it is especially designed in cartoon style especially for boys and girls to play unlimited time.

feature
*nice 3d environment
*nice sound effect
*tilt control
*suitable for all devices
